segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the boy's determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that stool like a little acrobat, balancing himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so cute, waiting for her share with such anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman is completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's funny how absorbed she is in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle around her feet is getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll slip and fall, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get those cookies before that happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's face is so hopeful, it's adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't wait to see how this all plays out.
segments.speaker: PAR
